product description: We produce up to 50 types of meat products: sausages, boiled sausages, delicacies, serverates
Always tasty, steadily quality and affor: Always tasty, steadily quality and affordable products
subtitle text: In 2015,the company successfully implemented the food safety system and obtained internationally recognized certificates HACCP and ISO22000
market description: The geographical area of sale of our products includes the purchase of our products throughout Georgia both at traditional retail sales points and in other chain chain stores
company_details: The meat production company Onima was founded in Kutaisi in 2008. At the first stage of production, the technological side was provided by local specialists. Since 2009, the management of the company from other countries regularly brings well-known specialists who care about increasing the range of products, maintaining the right technical and technological line. Completely new technological installations are also significantly facilitated by the production and sale of high-quality products. In 2015, the company introduced the food safety system and obtained internationally recognized certificates from HACCP and ISO22000. The enterprise employs more than 150 people and this number increases more and more as production increases. Currently, the company offers up to forty types of products to its customers. In the near future, the existing assortment will increase even more.
quality_control_details: Quality control is one of the top priorities for us. In 2015, the company introduced the food safety system and obtained internationally recognized certificates HACCP and ISO22000. This system covers all processes and areas and ensures the production and delivery of safe, stable products to our customers. Control is carried out strictly at each stage of production. stage.
follow_us_social_media: Follow us on social networks and get information about our products and company
